description: **Version 1.20 update adds support for WebOS 2.x and Touchpad as an emulated application. It also add support for more currencies in preferences.** Have roommates? Going on a trip with friends? Let Damage Report help you keep track of your bills and expenses on your WebOS device. Damage Report lets you create groups and will keep track of expenses within the group. You can add transactions to the group and Damage Report will automatically calculate what every member of the group owes. You can also add member to member payment to keep track of when friends pay you back. Damage Report can present its data in many different formats including a bar graph, balance sheet, or by emailing the data.
versionNote: Version 1.20 update adds support for WebOS 2.x and Touchpad as an emulated application. It also add support for more currencies in preferences.
